category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_tms_site_interop_transfer_mode
preference.preference_description: Indicates the transfer mode to use during Multi-Site TcXML import. There may be multiple values that can be set on importing site. Example values site1,XferMode1 site2,XferMode2 It means any data coming from site1, will use TransferMode XferMode1 to convert schema and vice versa.
